name: fair-fix
description: Invoice analysis system for automotive parts cost comparison

scripts.dev:backend: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && uvicorn app.main:app --reload --port 8000
scripts.build:backend: echo 'Python backend - no build step required'
scripts.build:all: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.test:all: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend
scripts.lint:backend: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && black . && isort . && flake8
scripts.lint:all: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend
scripts.setup:backend: cd backend && python -m venv venv && source venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.setup:all: npm run setup:backend && npm run setup:frontend
